title: (x) Bankinter corporate face - custom font {Ryuk}
content:
Looking for the name of this font !!

comments.content:
Corporate font. Co-operation between URW++ and the Corporate Identity (CI) Saffron Brand Consultants (Madrid).  
 [Bankinter at URW++](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229210501/http:/www.urwpp.de/english/schrift/identitype_cont.html)
